.inheritParentStyles{background:inherit;color:inherit;font-family:inherit;font-size:inherit;font-weight:inherit}.form-search-input{background:var(--white) no-repeat url(data:image/svg+xml;utf8;base64,);background-size:24px;background-position:10px;font-size:16px;height:auto;padding:8px 14px 8px 42px;width:100%}.form-search-results-wrapper{background:var(--white);border:1px solid var(--gray-light);border-radius:4px;display:none;padding:0;margin-top:-9px}.form-search-results-footer{color:var(--gray-dark);font-size:13px;padding:10px 18px;text-align:right}.form-search-results-footer a{color:inherit;text-decoration:underline}.form-search-no-result{padding:48px 0;text-align:center}.form-search-no-result:hover{background:0 0}.form-search-result{padding:10px 18px}.form-search-result-selected,.form-search-result:hover{background:var(--gray-lighter)}.form-search-result-selected{outline:2px solid var(--link-color)}.form-search-result-link{display:block}.form-search-result-link:hover{text-decoration:none}.form-search-result-title{color:var(--link-color);display:block;font-size:15px}.form-search-result-breadcrumb{color:var(--gray-dark);display:block;font-size:13px;margin-top:4px}.form-search-result-content{color:var(--text-color);display:block;font-size:14px;margin-top:4px}.form-search-result:hover .algolia-docsearch-suggestion--highlight{border:none}.algolia-docsearch-suggestion--highlight{border-bottom:1px solid var(--gray-light);font-weight:700}#search-modal-backdrop{background:rgba(0,0,0,.7);bottom:0;display:none;left:0;outline:0;position:fixed;right:0;top:0;z-index:10000}#search-modal-backdrop.is-visible{display:block!important}#search-modal-content{margin:15px auto;max-width:640px;outline:0}#search-modal-content .form-search-input{box-shadow:none;border-width:2px}#search-modal-close-button{background:0 0;border:0;color:#fff;display:block;font-weight:700;outline:none;padding:0 0 5px;text-align:right;width:100%}
